content: The provided context does not include any information about a LinkedIn profile.
sources:
Projects Undertaken

• Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Chatbot capable of retrieving and generating context-based responses.
• Worked on multiple data analytics case studies involving data cleaning, visualization, and predictive modeling.
• Developed an end-to-end Score Predictor web app using Flask and machine learning pipelines.
• Gained a strong understanding of machine learning algorithms, evaluation metrics, and model deployment.

Through these projects, I’ve developed the technical and problem-solving skills necessary to contribute effectively as a Software Engineer. I am confident that my enthusiasm to learn and ability to adapt quickly will allow me to excel in any technology I am trained on.



Github- https://github.com/usernameforarihant

Internship/Training Experience Statement

I may not have formal industry experience yet, but I have built a strong foundation in programming, data analysis, and machine learning through hands-on projects and practical learning.

Key Skills and Knowledge

• Proficient in Python, SQL, and programming fundamentals.
• Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and relational databases.
• Experience working with Flask, Streamlit, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.
• Basic knowledge of React, Node.js, and API integration.
• Familiar with version control (Git) and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).

Projects Undertaken

content:
Yes, several projects have been undertaken, including:

1. Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Chatbot capable of retrieving and generating context-based responses.
2. Worked on multiple data analytics case studies involving data cleaning, visualization, and predictive modeling.
3. Developed an end-to-end Score Predictor web app using Flask and machine learning pipelines.

These projects helped in developing technical and problem-solving skills relevant to a Software Engineer role.
